participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Resilient and hopeful, Amina loves to express herself through dance and values her freedom.
participant_1.background: i like to dance. my aunt helped me escape when i was 16. now i live in the united states. i was forced to marry when i was 18. i was born in somalia.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Energetic and creative, Lily enjoys expressing her individuality through fashion and music.
participant_2.background: my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. i'm a blonde girl with really short hair. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games. i love wearing skinny jeans and leggings. i'm rather skinny as i like to stay in shape.

content.text: Where is I live in the us?
What do you feel about my person? I was born in the us, but I was born in the usa
